job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: ltstronggtltugtDescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtOlives AI workforce is built to fix our broken healthcare system by addressing healthcares most burdensome issues  delivering hospitals and health systems increased revenue reduced costs and increased capacity People feel lost in the system today and healthcare employees are essentially working in the dark due to outdated technology that creates a lack of shared knowledge and siloed data Olive is designed to drive connections shining a new light on the broken healthcare processes that stand between providers and patient care She uses AI to reveal lifechanging insights that make healthcare more efficient affordable and effective Olives vision is to unleash a trillion dollars of hidden potential within healthcare by connecting its disconnected systems Olive is improving healthcare operations today so everyone can benefit from a healthier industry tomorrowltbrgtltbrgtThis Data Scientist opening will be work within our newest strategic maneuver Olive Shares This product was created to connect providers payers and patients to the Internet of Healthcare At Olive we build solutions to solve realworld problems and thats why were starting by addressing a huge pain point shared by providers payers and patients alike prior authorization Olive Shares will leverage the amazing AI toolkit and solutions weve developed for prior authorization and bring them together to form the beginning of Olive SharesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtAbility to collaborate with others and solve complex problemltligtltligtProficiency in solutions design and requirementsltligtltligtEmploy machine learning and statistical modeling to create and enhance data driven products and solutionsltligtltligtAnalyze and extract insights from internal and external dataltligtltligtWork with Big Data and transform complex datasets into more usable formatsltligtltligtWork with a variety of data science tools and programming languages ltligtltligtEnsure data quality throughout all stages of acquisition and processing including areas such as data sourcingcollection ground truth generation normalization and transformationltligtltligtOutstanding verbal and written communication skills to technical and nontechnical audiences of various levels in the organization eg executive management individual contributorsltligtltligtExcellent analytical decisionmaking problemsolving team and time management skillsltligtltligtAbility to persuade and influence others on the best approachltligtltligtPositive outlook strong work ethic and responsive to internal and external clients and contactsltligtltligtAbility to work as part of a team or alone making a strong contribution in either scenarioltligtltligtDeliveryoriented team player who takes responsibility for the teams success and strives to continually learn and improveltligtltligtAbility to interface with all levels of employees and effectively interact with various functional areas and facilitiesltligtltligtAbility to establish and maintain effective working relationships with employees management and clientsltligtltligtSense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on company successltligtltligtCritical thinking and problemsolving skillsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtMasters or PhD in Statistics Decision Sciences Applied Mathematics Economics or Computer Science or the equivalent combination of education training and work experienceltligtltligtKnowledge in machine learning artificial intelligence statistical modeling data visualization and data analysisltligtltligtProficient in data science tools and programming languages such as pull from existing requirements ltligtltligtExperience or knowledge of cloudbased technologyltligtltligt2 years of handson experience with databases including MSSQL Mongo ampamp ElasticsearchltligtltligtKnowledge of JavaJVM based languagesltbrgtltligtltulgtAt Olive were committed to growing and empowering an inclusive community within our company and industry This is why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of the best and brightest from all backgrounds experiences and perspectives across our organization Research shows that oftentimes women and other minority groups only apply to open roles if they meet 100 of the listed criteria Olive encourages everyone  including women people of color individuals with disabilities and those in the LGBTQIA community  to apply for our available positions even if they dont necessarily check every box on the job
